sentences.en: 'stinking bitches, fetch that cuckold to play for us.
sentences.cn: “ 臭货, 喊龟子出来,跟老子拉琴,赏一千!

sentences.en: " How can we cook in a pan that's stewed your stinking stockings?
sentences.cn: “ 染臭袜子的锅,还能煮鸡子吃!还要它? ”

sentences.en: He's stinking rich, and with no more talent than he ever had before.
sentences.cn: 他现在已经有几个臭钱了，但仍然和以前一样没什么才能。

sentences.en: Here were crumbling tenements, squalid courtyards and stinking alleys.
sentences.cn: 随处可见破烂的住房 、 肮脏的庭院和臭气熏天的小胡同.

sentences.en: I don't want your stinking money.
I was pushed into a filthy, stinking room.
sentences.cn: 我被推进一间又脏又臭的屋子里。

sentences.en: I wouldn't feed that stinking meat to my dog.
sentences.cn: 我不愿用那块臭肉喂我的狗.

sentences.en: Isn't It'stinking of tracy not to invite father to the wedding?
sentences.cn: 你不认为这就是为什么特蕾西讨厌邀请爸爸参加婚礼 吗 ?

sentences.en: It's a stinking mean low trick.
That won't flush out all the sewage, but it should unclog some stinking drains.
sentences.cn: 那样做虽不能将污物全部冲掉，但应该能疏通一些散发恶臭的排水管。

sentences.en: The only way for that to happen is for me to watch this stinking show!
sentences.cn: 要实现梦想我就得看这无聊的录相!

sentences.en: Those lousy, stinking ships. It was them that destroyed us.
sentences.cn: 是的!就是那些该死的蠢猪似的臭飞船! 是它们毁了我们.

sentences.en: We've turned sparkling rivers into stinking rivers.
sentences.cn: 我们已把晶莹的河流变成了臭水沟.

words.tran_cn: 恶臭弹；（产于美国东南部的）一种小麝龟
使发出臭气；用臭味驱赶
发恶臭的；非常讨厌的；烂醉如泥的

phrases.tran_cn: 发恶臭；散发出…的气味；[口]含有…的迹象（尤指不良的）

trans.tran_en: having a very strong unpleasant smell

trans.tran_cn: 散发出恶臭( stink的现在分词 )，发臭味，名声臭，糟透
